question: The Drugs and Magic Remedies (Objectionable Advertisements) Act was passed in which year?
explanation: The Drugs and Magic Remedies (Objectionable Advertisements) Act was passed in the year 1954. Th Act prohibits advertisements of drugs and remedies that claim to have magical properties. It makes doing so a cognizable offence.<sup id=\"cite_ref-Srivastava_2-0\" class=\"reference\"></sup>
